lines: You enjoying this?
You know I am, love.
Suddenly Aldous is peeing on the Prostitute.
I like that alright... what the bloody shit?
Aldous THROWS UP on the prostitute and COLLAPSES.
You piece of shit!
Gerich meleth nîn, ada.
I amar prestar aen... han mathon ne nen, han mathon ne chae, a han nostan  ned gwilith.
I amar prestar aen... han mathon ne nen, han mathon ne chae, a han nostan  ned gwilith.
The power of the enemy is growing.  Sauron will use his puppet Saruman...
The power of the enemy is growing.  Sauron will use his puppet Saruman...
...to destroy the people of Rohan.
...to destroy the people of Rohan.
Isengard has been unleashed.
Isengard has been unleashed.
...the last free kingdom of Men.
...the last free kingdom of Men.
His war on this country will come swiftly.
His war on this country will come swiftly.
He senses the Ring is close.
He senses the Ring is close.
The strength of the Ring-bearer is failing.
The strength of the Ring-bearer is failing.
...the quest will claim his life. You know this.
...the quest will claim his life. You know this.
FADE TO BLACK.

EXT. FOREST OF ITHILIEN - DAY  ANGLE ON: The GONDORIAN RANGERS continue prodding FRODO and SAM along.       ANGLE ON: FARAMIR, leading the band of RANGERS.       WIDE ANGLE ON: The WATERFALL in ITHILIEN, which conceals the hideout of the RANGERS, HENNETH ANNÛN.  INT. HENNETH ANNÛN - DAY  ANGLE ON: The MEN pass FRODO and SAM to one another within the hideout to imprison them.     INTERCUT: GALADRIEL’S EYES, watching across the distance.     INTERCUT: THE EYE OF SAURON on BARAD-DÛR.      PULL BACK TO REVEAL: The TOWER deep within MORDOR. NAZGÛL fly around the TOWER on FELL-BEASTS, guarding it from invaders.  INTERCUT: CLOSE ON: GALADRIEL’S EYES, with their deep pools of wisdom.
The young captain of Gondor has but to extend his hands, take the Ring for his own and the world will fall.
The young captain of Gondor has but to extend his hands, take the Ring for his own and the world will fall.
It is close now...
It is close now...
...so close to achieving its goal.
...so close to achieving its goal.
GALADRIEL   Do we leave Middle-earth to its fate?  Do we let them stand alone?
